mil3.1.9:1.2_0: “bhante nāgasena, yaṁ panetaṁ brūsi ‘aññehi ca kusalehi dhammehī’ti, katame te kusalā dhammā”ti?
mil3.1.9:1.3_0: “Sīlaṁ, mahārāja, saddhā vīriyaṁ sati samādhi, ime te kusalā dhammā”ti.
mil3.1.9:1.5_0: “Patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṁ, mahārāja, sīlaṁ sabbesaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgasatipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādajhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ sīlaṁ patiṭṭhaṁ, sīle patiṭṭhito kho, mahārāja, yogāvacaro sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāveti saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyanti, sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti.
mil3.1.9:2.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, ye keci bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuḍḍhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti, sabbe te pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya vuḍḍhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti;
mil3.1.9:2.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yogāvacaro sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāveti saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyan”ti.
mil3.1.9:3.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā kayiranti, sabbe te pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya kayiranti;
mil3.1.9:3.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yogāvacaro sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāveti saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyan”ti.
mil3.1.9:4.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṁ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṁ nagaraṭṭhānaṁ sodhāpetvā khāṇukaṇṭakaṁ apakaḍḍhāpetvā bhūmiṁ samaṁ kārāpetvā tato aparabhāge vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvā nagaraṁ māpeti;
mil3.1.9:4.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yogāvacaro sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāveti saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyan”ti.
mil3.1.9:5.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, laṅghako sippaṁ dassetukāmo pathaviṁ khaṇāpetvā sakkharakathalaṁ apakaḍḍhāpetvā bhūmiṁ samaṁ kārāpetvā mudukāya bhūmiyā sippaṁ dasseti;
mil3.1.9:5.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yogāvacaro sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya pañcindriyāni bhāveti saddhindriyaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyanti.
